name: Climate and Clean Air Coalition
goal: The Climate and Clean Air Coalition is a voluntary partnership of governments, intergovernmental organizations, businesses, scientific institutions and civil society organizations committed to improving air quality and protecting the climate through actions to reduce short-lived climate pollutants.
interests: Agriculture, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Public Health
euInitiatives: The 2030 - 2050 climate and energy framework, especially by delivering environmental and health benefits (e.g. through reduced air pollution); international development cooperation
